original_title: Chonda Pierce - Have I Got a Story For You
overview: Christian comedienne Chonda Pierce delivers a set of her signature brand of clean standup and inspirational storytelling in this release from M2 Communications. Chonda Pierce: Have I Got a Story For You also includes a bonus music video for the song {&"The Girls are Back in Town"} with contemporary Christian singer Sandi Patty.
title: Chonda Pierce - Have I Got a Story For You
